snippet.title: Official Call of Duty: Black Ops 2 Apocalypse DLC Map Pack Preview Video
snippet.description:
The fourth and final DLC Map Pack from Treyarch, "Apocalypse" marks the thrilling conclusion of the Call of Duty: Black Ops 2 DLC season. Apocalypse introduces four Multiplayer maps: Pod, Frost, Takeoff, and Dig. 
 
Also included is Origins, Treyarch's deepest and most imaginative Zombies experience to date. Taking place in a Dieselpunk-themed First World War, Origins reunites players with the four original Zombies heroes as they team up to fight off hordes of the undead.
 
Apocalypse arrives first on Xbox LIVE on August 27th, with other platforms to follow. http://www.callofduty.com/blackops2
